TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IReflect

span.span: Interoperates with the [IDispatch interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口用于与进行互操作[IDispatch 接口](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5)。The interface is used to interoperate with the [IDispatch interface](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/ebbff4bc-36b2-4861-9efa-ffa45e013eb5). 定义的一个子集反射方法。 defines a subset of the reflection methods. 实现此接口，一个类型时从作为 COM 访问对象时，来自定义其行为`IDispatch`对象。Implementing this interface enables a type to customize its behavior when the object is being accessed from COM as an `IDispatch` object. 类可以用于封送对象实现或作为 COM`IDispatch`对象，反之亦然。The class can be used to marshal an object that implements or as a COM `IDispatch` object, and vice versa.

param.span: 参数可以有下列属性：、、、 和 。

span.span: A parameter can have the following attributes: , , , , and .

param.span: 这些属性分别表示 [In]、[Out]、[retval]、[optional] 和默认参数。

span.span: These represent [In], [Out], [retval], [optional], and a default parameter, respectively.

param.span: 这些属性由不同的互操作性服务使用。

span.span: These attributes are used by various interoperability services.

param.span: 用于控制类型强制的 的实例。

span.span: An instance of used to govern the coercion of types.

param.span: 例如，culture 将表示 1000 的 转换为 值，因为不同的区域性以不同的方式表示 1000。

span.span: For example, culture converts a that represents 1000 to a value, since 1000 is represented differently by different cultures.

param.span: 参数的 数组。

span.span: A array of parameters.
Invokes a specified member.
The specified member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在指定的活页夹和调用属性的约束下，要调用的方法必须为可访问，并且提供与指定的自变量列表最具体的匹配。The method that is to be invoked must be accessible and provide the most specific match with the specified argument list, under the constraints of the specified binder and invocation attributes. 调用某个方法，如果方法声明中的参数的数目等于在指定的自变量列表中，参数的数目和每个自变量的类型可以转换由参数的类型联编程序。A method is invoked if the number of parameters in the method declaration equals the number of arguments in the specified argument list, and the type of each argument can be converted by the binder to the type of the parameter. > [!NOTE] > 参数修饰符的数组传递给方法必须包含单个参数修饰符。The array of parameter modifiers passed to the method must contain a single parameter modifier. 当确定哪些参数需要通过引用向 COM 公开时传递时，被认为仅第一个参数修饰符Only the first parameter modifier is considered when determining which argument needs to be passed by reference when exposed to COM. 联编程序查找所有匹配的方法，根据请求的绑定类型 (， ，依次类推)。The binder finds all matching methods, in accordance with the type of binding requested (, , and so on). 按名称、 数量的参数和一组绑定器中定义的搜索修饰符进行筛选的方法集。The set of methods is filtered by the name, number of arguments, and a set of search modifiers defined in the binder. 选择方法后，它调用的并且可访问性检查在该点。After the method is selected, it is invoked, and accessibility is checked at that point. 搜索可能来控制哪些方法集是基于与该方法关联的可访问性特性。The search may control which set of methods is searched based upon the accessibility attribute associated with the method. 选择要调用的方法。 selects the method to be invoked. 默认的联编程序选择最精确的匹配。The default binder selects the most specific match. 访问限制会忽略完全受信任的代码。Access restrictions are ignored for fully trusted code. 也就是说，是在私有构造函数、 方法、 字段和属性访问而完全受信任代码时，通过反射调用。That is, private constructors, methods, fields, and properties can be accessed and invoked through reflection whenever the code is fully trusted. ## Examples 下面的示例获取的值属性。The following example obtains the value of the property. [!code-cpp[Classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_Classic/classic IReflect.InvokeMember Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

The method cannot be found.

exception.span: 在没有所需 的情况下调用私有成员。

span.span: A private member is invoked without the necessary .
